entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Flurries beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
